Package com.valmet.watermark.service

Class AddWaterMarkToPdfService

java.lang.Object
com.valmet.watermark.service.AddWaterMarkToPdfService
@Service public class AddWaterMarkToPdfService extends Object
AddWaterMarkToPdfService for handling PDF watermarking operations.

This service provides functionalities to upload, process, and add watermark as a image to PDF files, including the creation of ZIP archives for multiple files.

Version:
1.0
Author:
BJIT

  • Method Details

    • getWatermarkedPdfAsync

      @Async("taskExecutor") public CompletableFuture<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>> getWatermarkedPdfAsync(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> file, String strPersonID, String strSystem, String strEmail) throws IOException
      Asynchronously processes uploaded PDF files, applies watermarks, and returns a response.
      Parameters:
      file - list of uploaded PDF files as MultipartFile
      strPersonID - optional person ID for watermark metadata
      strSystem - optional system metadata for the watermark
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture containing the ResponseEntity with the watermarked file or a ZIP archive of files
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file handling

    • getWatermarkedPdf

      @Retry(name="watermark-api") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getWatermarkedPdf(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> file, String strPersonID, String strSystem, String strEmail) throws IOException
      Processes uploaded PDF files, applies watermarks, and returns a response.

      If only one file is uploaded, a watermarked file is returned as PDF. For multiple files, a ZIP archive of watermarked files is generated and returned a ZIP.

      Parameters:
      file - list of uploaded PDF files as MultipartFile
      strPersonID - optional person ID for watermark metadata
      strSystem - optional system metadata for the watermark
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the watermarked file or a ZIP archive of files
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file handling

    • validateFiles

      public void validateFiles(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> files)
      Validates uploaded files for size and content type.
      Parameters:
      files - list of uploaded files as MultipartFile
      Throws:
      WatermarkApplicationException - if any file is invalid or exceeds the size limit

      public String transferFileToServerPath(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, String uploadDir, String dateTime)
      Transfers an uploaded file to the server's specified directory.
      Parameters:
      file - the uploaded file as MultipartFile
      uploadDir - the directory where the file should be stored
      Returns:
      the name of the stored file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the file cannot be stored

      public boolean isPDFContentType(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Checks if the uploaded file is a valid PDF.
      Parameters:
      file - the uploaded file as MultipartFile
      Returns:
      true if the file is a PDF; false otherwise

      public CompletableFuture<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>> getInputPDFAsync(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> file) throws IOException
      Asynchronously processes uploaded PDF files and returns a response.

    • getInputPDF

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getInputPDF(List<org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> file) throws IOException
      This method is called when API is failed to generate watermark and throw exception. Processes uploaded PDF files, and returns a response.

      If only one file is uploaded, a file is returned as PDF. For multiple files, a ZIP archive of files is generated and returned a ZIP.

      Parameters:
      file - list of uploaded PDF files as MultipartFile
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the watermarked file or a ZIP archive of files
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file handling
